name: Tripes du Port
desc: An offal dish. Cut the ingredients into pieces, put them in a pot, seal with dough, and bake. This recipe originated in a harbor town. The story of the town has long been swallowed by the rising seas, but this delicacy yet survives in Fontaine.

customize.name: Recipe: Tripes du Port
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Tripes du Port.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Carrot
customize.desc: A healthy and nutritious vegetable that is crunchy and sweet to the taste. Easy to grow and harvest.

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Fermented Juice
customize.desc: A fermented juice with a unique fruity scent. It is often used as a marinade.

customize.name: Delicious Tripes du Port
customize.desc: An offal dish. The flaky yet soft cow's stomach has an almost fruity fragrance. Unlike other surprising delicacies that take the world by storm, the dish is overflowing with rich traditional savor, and once you have a single bite, you simply cannot stop!

customize.name: Suspicious Tripes du Port
customize.desc: An offal dish. The texture of the cow's stomach is like wind-dried leather, and it is completely unchewable. Even worse is the strange flavor spreading throughout your mouth, it's like you've taken an "expired canned food" challenge... Just giving up might be your best option.

value.text: Revives a character and restores 1,200 HP.
